name: Shitty Ninja Warriors
description:
In a world where shit is alive and wants piss dead, an Official Shitty Ninja Training Academy is built to train the most experienced Warriors of the Country of Shits, but Pisssnakes find out about that plan and carry out an attack in which Sensei Hu is killed. Main character - Osas, sets off on an adventure to Pisssnake castle to kill Pisssnake King Szczepan and end the war between the countries of Pisssnakes and Shits.

My first game btw :P. I made a game about shit cuz I knew it would be shitty.

Release Date: 11 November 2020
